meanings.definition: Able to tolerate a wide range of temperatures.
meanings.sent1: The eurythermous lizard basked comfortably in the warm sun.
meanings.sent2: The eurythermous plant adapted easily to the changing weather.
meanings.sent3: The eurythermous fish enjoyed swimming in both warm and cool waters.
meanings.sent4: Her eurythermous nature allowed her to navigate through life's ups and downs.
meanings.sent5: The eurythermous bird soared effortlessly through the varying climates.

meanings.definition: Organisms that can thrive in various temperature conditions.
meanings.sent1: Eurythermous are fascinating creatures that can survive in extreme environments.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study eurythermous to understand their adaptability to different climates.
meanings.sent3: The zoo showcased a variety of eurythermous species from around the world.
meanings.sent4: In the wild, eurythermous organisms play a crucial role in maintaining ecosystem balance.
meanings.sent5: Explorers marveled at the resilience of eurythermous life forms in harsh conditions.
